titleStmt.title: Óláfs saga helga (Kringla fragment) : Lbs fragm. 82 : A digital edition

availability.p: Licence accepted by the editor Matteo Tarsi in mail to Odd Einar Haugen 29 December 2015.

msIdentifier.repository: Landsbókasafn Íslands - The Icelandic National Library, Reykjavík, Iceland
msIdentifier.msName: The Kringla fragment of Óláfs saga helga

projectDesc.p: This manuscript text has been encoded according to the standard set out in The Menota handbook (version 2.0 beta), at http://www.aksis.uib.no/menota/guidelines as of 2008-05-16.

normalization.p: This manuscript text has been encoded on three levels: facsimile, diplomatic and normalised.

correction.p: This text has been thoroughly proofread and cross-checked by the editor before publication

interpretation.p: This text has been fully lemmatised and morphologically analysed according to the rules specified in ch. 8 of the Menota Handbook, v. 2.0

revisionDesc.change:
2020-02-25
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Made a few consistency corrections of the me:msa name tokens; (2) Changed “eE” to “eP” when the enclitic is a pronoun and to “eN” when it is a negative particle
2020-02-17 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen: Made two minor corrections of typos in the morphological annotation

2016-10-23
Matteo Tarsi University of Iceland : (1) Updated the encoding of skaldic stanzas (2) Made the file v. 1.2

2016-07-17
Matteo Tarsi University of Iceland : (1) Re-organised the encoding of skaldic stanzas; (2) Made the file v. 1.1

2016-02-24
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Revised the "availability" element in the header with a CC-BY-SA 4.0 licence; (2) Made the file v. 1.0.3
2016-01-19 Odd Einar HaugenUniversity of Bergen: (1) Gave the "msName" as "The Kringla fragment of Óláfs saga helga"; (2) Made the file v. 1.0.2
2016-01-12 Odd Einar HaugenUniversity of Bergen: (1) Added the attribute ed="ms" to all "pb", "cb" and "lb" elements; (2) Made the file v. 1.0.1

2015-12-29 Odd Einar HaugenUniversity of Bergen: Received a fully valid file from Matteo Tarsi, and only changed the initial links to the schema and entity list, also updated the information in the publication and edition statements
